headline: Aesthetic Botox Treatments
subheading: Precise, gentle treatments to enhance your natural beauty
mobileFactoid: Botox and hyaluronic acid treatments can significantly improve overall appearance
mobileTip: Advanced treatments performed by a specialist dentist
botoxDesc: Botox injections are designed to reduce expression lines and wrinkles in the face, using a safe substance approved for medical use
hyaluronicDesc: Hyaluronic acid treatments restore volume and elasticity to the skin, smooth out wrinkles, and provide a more youthful appearance

processSteps.title: Initial Consultation
processSteps.description: Personal consultation with the doctor to assess needs and create a personalized treatment plan

processSteps.title: Treatment Planning
processSteps.description: Detailed explanation of recommended treatments, expected results, and personalized adaptation for the patient

processSteps.title: Treatment Procedure
processSteps.description: The treatment itself takes only 15-30 minutes, with minimal discomfort

processSteps.title: Post-Treatment Instructions
processSteps.description: Detailed explanation of required care after injection and recommendations for optimal results

processSteps.title: Follow-up
processSteps.description: Follow-up appointment after about two weeks to check results and make additional adjustments if needed

safetyConcerns: All treatments are performed by an experienced specialist doctor
Using the highest quality materials approved by the Ministry of Health
Sterile environment and strict medical conditions
Personal adaptation of treatment to health condition and aesthetic needs

faqItems.question: Are Botox and hyaluronic acid treatments painful?
faqItems.answer: The treatments involve minimal discomfort. A local anesthetic cream can be applied before injection. Most patients report only a slight pinching sensation.

faqItems.question: How long do the results last?
faqItems.answer: Botox results last between 3-6 months. Hyaluronic acid treatments can last 6-18 months, depending on the treated area and type of material.

faqItems.question: When will I see results?
faqItems.answer: Botox results begin to show within 3-7 days and peak after about two weeks. Hyaluronic acid injection results are visible immediately.

faqItems.question: Are there any side effects?
faqItems.answer: Common side effects include slight redness, swelling, or mild bruising at the injection site, which usually subside within a few days.

faqItems.question: Who is suitable for these treatments?
faqItems.answer: The treatments are suitable for healthy individuals interested in improving their aesthetic appearance. A comprehensive assessment will be conducted during the consultation to determine treatment suitability.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Most patients report minimal discomfort during the procedure. We use ultra-fine needles and can apply a topical numbing cream if needed.
faq.a2: Results typically last 3-6 months, depending on the treatment area and individual factors.
faq.a3: Initial results can be seen within 24-48 hours, with full results visible after 7-14 days.
faq.a4: There is minimal to no downtime. Most patients return to normal activities immediately.

beforeAfter.title: Before & After Results
beforeAfter.subtitle: See the difference our treatments make
